author: jukka
msg: JCR-1878: Use Apache Tika for text extraction
Fix potential cause of the occasional IndexingQueueTest failures. Our implementation of the new Tika 0.5 parse() method signature didn't check the extraction block used by the test case.

author: fmeschbe
msg: SLING-1219 Fix description of test entry field and ensure map(String) is called if the user provided just a path.

author: jukka
msg: JCR-2423: Make Jackrabbit repository DTD easier to extend
Add hooks that make it easier for subclasses to customize the config parsing.

author: pamarcelot
msg: Removed specific version properties (replaced by ${pom.version} taken from the parent pom) (except for the apacheds-launcher library project)

author: jleroux
msg: I realized that in some cases it's better to keep the country part of locale, so this is better than r887164 (Fix a calendar i18n initialization issue in lookup.ftl)
And generalized to all FTL files where needed.
I only tested for lookups, but should be ok, since the same trick is used in other FTL files.
